CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Express Takeaway relative to Breakfast Rush Order?
SRP.A: Express Takeaway is {above} Breakfast Rush Order in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Express Takeaway relative to Loyalty Member Order?
SRP.A: Express Takeaway is {above} Loyalty Member Order in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Seasonal Special Order relative to Standard Dine-in?
SRP.A: Seasonal Special Order is {below} Standard Dine-in in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Large Group Booking}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Dine-in}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Standard Dine-in's minimum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Standard Dine-in's minimum Average Order Value is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Large Group Booking's maximum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Large Group Booking's maximum Average Order Value is in {1984}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1981, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 1975 and 1977?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between 1977 and 1981 was {larger} than between 1975 and 1977.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Order Value in 1974 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total average order value in 1974 was {lower} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1984, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between 1979 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1971 and 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1984, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1971 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1978 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1975.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Large Group Booking} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Loyalty Member Order and Premium Delivery first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Loyalty Member Order and Premium Delivery first exchanged leading positions in {1970}.
